function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on narrow financing base, including international development assistance and tourism revenues","Impact":"Potential jeopardy of entire PCA budget if funding streams decline or fail","Mitigation":"Diversify funding sources, create financial reserves, and develop sustainable financial models","Technologies":"Financial management systems, economic modeling tools, and impact assessment software","People":"Conservation authorities, local communities, and stakeholders","Owner":"Conservation authorities, government agencies, and international organizations"},{"Description":"Structural factors limiting the effectiveness of conservation spending","Impact":"Increased pressure on PCAs and their budgets, and higher conservation costs","Mitigation":"Improving planning, management, and financial systems, and creating economic incentives for conservation","Technologies":"Conservation planning software, financial management tools, and economic incentive models","People":"Conservation authorities, local communities, and stakeholders","Owner":"Conservation authorities, government agencies, and financial institutions"},{"Description":"COVID-19-related impacts on PCA finance","Impact":"Unforeseen financial challenges, potential budget cuts, and increased financial instability","Mitigation":"Developing contingency plans, seeking alternative funding sources, and implementing cost-saving measures","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, financial forecasting software, and crisis management systems","People":"Conservation authorities, local communities, and stakeholders","Owner":"Conservation authorities, government agencies, and international organizations"}]}
